name: Companies with product or business process innovation activities and results of innovation activities, by company size: 2017–19

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_activities_abandoned_or_suspended_before_completion

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2020 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2019.
